data.name: EX_ADD_AGGREGATE_FAIL
data.value: Failed to add the aggregate(s) to the repository.

data.name: EX_BEGIN_TRANS_DOMAIN_REPOSITORY_FAIL
data.value: Failed to begin the transaction for the domain repository.

data.name: EX_BEGIN_TRANS_STORAGE_FAIL
data.value: Failed to begin transaction with the isolation level {0}.

data.name: EX_BUILD_FIELD_NAME_FAIL

data.name: EX_COMMIT_DOMAIN_REPOSITORY_CONTEXT_FAIL
data.value: Failed to commit the domain repository Unit of Work.

data.name: EX_COMMIT_ROLLBACK_WHEN_DISPOSE_STORAGE_FAIL

data.name: EX_COMMIT_TRANS_STORAGE_FAIL

data.name: EX_DELETE_FROM_STORAGE_FAIL

data.name: EX_DESERIALIZE_FAIL

data.name: EX_DISPOSE_DOMAIN_REPOSITORY_FAIL
data.value: Failed to dispose the domain repository.

data.name: EX_DOMAINEVENTSTORE_INVALID_CONNSTR
data.value: Database connection string was not specified as it must be used by LINQ to SQL Domain Event Store. Check the configuration file to make sure the configuration section for event storage was defined and the connection string was provided properly.

data.name: EX_DOMAINEVENTSTORE_INVALID_MAPPING
data.value: LINQ to SQL mapping xml was not defined as it must be used by the LINQ to SQL Domain Event Store. Check the configuration file to make sure the configuration section for event storage was defined and the mapping xml was specified property.

data.name: EX_DOMAINEVENTSTORE_INVALID_TYPE
data.value: The type of the configuration section is not valid as required. Required: {0}, Actual: {1}.

data.name: EX_EXPRESSION_NODE_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORT
data.value: The expression type {0} is not supported by current version of Apworks.

data.name: EX_FINDALL_AGGREGATE_FAIL
data.value: Failed to find all the aggregates.

data.name: EX_FIND_AGGREGATE_FAIL
data.value: Error occurs when trying to find the aggregate(s) from the repository.

data.name: EX_GENERATE_UID_FAIL
data.value: General error occurs when generating the unique identifier.

data.name: EX_GENERATE_WHERE_CLAUSE_FAIL
data.value: The where clause builder failed to generate the where clause for the expression {0}.

data.name: EX_GENERATE_WHERE_NOT_SUPPORT
data.value: There are some unsupported operations when generating where clause for the expression {0}.

data.name: EX_GETALL_AGGREGATE_FAIL
data.value: Failed to get all the aggregates from the repository.

data.name: EX_GET_AGGREGATE_FAIL
data.value: Error occurs when trying to get the aggregate(s) from the repository.

data.name: EX_GET_IDENTITY_GENERATOR_FAIL
data.value: Unable to get the identity generator.

data.name: EX_INIT_RDBMS_DOMAIN_EVENT_STORAGE_FAIL

data.name: EX_INIT_XML_STORAGE_MAPPING_FAIL

data.name: EX_INSERT_INTO_STORAGE_FAIL

data.name: EX_INVALID_CONFIG_ELEMENT
data.value: Configuration element {0}, which is required by Apworks, was not configured properly.

data.name: EX_INVALID_HANDLER_SIGNATURE
data.value: The method {0} going to be used as domain event handler doesn't have a correct signature.

data.name: EX_INVALID_METHOD_CALL_ARGUMENT_NUMBER
data.value: Number of the arguments used by the method call should only be one.

data.name: EX_LOAD_OBJ_CONTAINER_FAIL
data.value: Failed to initialize and load the object container.

data.name: EX_MEMBER_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORT

data.name: EX_METHOD_NOT_SUPPORT

data.name: EX_PROCESS_NODE_NOT_SUPPORT
data.value: The process of the expression type {0} is not supported.
